climbs.name: Righty - O
climbs.fa: Jerry Wingenter and Sam Nicolai. Circa 2016. (Ground Up)

content.description: Starts at roughly the same spot as the Horning Route and climbs the arete until the holds go to hell. After some personal reflection, follow the natural progression of holds to the right and onto a pretty sick face. Be sure to hang onto your butt, this little humdinger packs a punch all the way to the tippy top.
content.protection: 1 fixed pin and some small gear. A ball nut might be what helps you to nut up and not give up.

climbs.name: Horning Route
climbs.fa: Dennis Horning and John Abbott: Circa 1972. (Ground Up)

content.description: Climb a south east arete past a pin in a horizontal crack and hang onto your butt after heading left.
A small, darkly colored granite spire a few hundred steps east of Layer Cake, Sabre Tooth Boulder and Morning Rae.
